fruits.name: Apple
fruits.description: A crisp and juicy fruit with various colors.

fruits.name: Banana
fruits.description: A sweet and elongated fruit with a yellow peel.

fruits.name: Orange
fruits.description: A citrus fruit with a bright orange color and juicy segments.

fruits.name: Mango
fruits.description: A tropical fruit with a sweet and fragrant flavor.

fruits.name: Watermelon
fruits.description: A large and refreshing fruit with a juicy red flesh.

fruits.name: Grape

fruits.name: Pineapple

fruits.name: Strawberry

fruits.name: Pear

fruits.name: Cherry
fruits.description: A small, round fruit with a red or black color and a sweet or tart taste.

fruits.name: Lemon

fruits.name: Lime
